content.rendered:
Checked baggage

Only 2 pieces of baggage of 23 kg are allowed in the hold (on long-haul flights). If any of your baggage exceeds the statutory weight, you will need to buy excess baggage.

The maximum weight allowed in the hold, per luggage is:
– 32 kg for business class travelers, on all our networks (except on flights operated on ATR 42 and twin otter aircraft)
– 23 kg for economy travelers

Domestic flights: 

BOOKING CLASS PRICES LUGGAGE (S) CABIN BAGAGES SOUTE
ECONOMIC Rates With reductions (Coup de coeur, Happy day) 1 x 5 kg maximum 1 x 10 kg
Discovery, Libertalia 1 x 5 kg maximum 1 x 20 kg
PREMIUM (IF AVAILABLE) Premium 1 x 8 kg maximum 1 x 23 kg
BUSINESS Sapphire 1 x 10 kg maximum 1 x 32 kg

 

Regional Flights

BOOKING CLASS PRICES LUGGAGE (S) CABIN BAGAGES SOUTE
Economic All Prices in Economy /
Between Madagascar and LaRéunion / Mayotte / Moroni		 1 x 8 kg maximum 1 x 30 kg
All Rates in Economy /
Between Madagascar Mauritius / Johannesburg		 1 x 8 kg maximum 2 x 23 kg
Premium Premium 1 x 10 kg maximum 2 x 23 kg
Business Sapphire 1 x 10 kg maximum 2 x 32 kg

 

Long-haul flights

BOOKING CLASS PRICES LUGGAGE (S) CABIN BAGAGES SOUTE
Economic All Rates in Economy 1 x 12 kg maximum 2 x 23 kg
Premium Premium 2 pieces for a maximum of 18 kg 2 x 23 kg
Business Sapphire 2 pieces for a maximum of 18 kg 2 x 32 kg

 

For more details visit : https://www.air madagascar.com.lb/english/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Air Madagascar Excess Baggage

Air Madagascar Hand | Cabin Baggage
